mapper.select: SELECT s.scene_id, s.sname FROM f_mesh m INNER JOIN f_scene s ON m.id = s.mid INNER JOIN f_scene_setting a ON a.sid = s.id AND s.uid = #{uid} AND m.mesh_id = #{meshId}
SELECT g.group_id, g.gname FROM f_group g INNER JOIN f_group_setting gs ON g.id = gs.gid INNER JOIN f_mesh m ON m.id = gs.mid AND m.uid = #{uid} AND m.mesh_id = #{meshId}
mapper.update: UPDATE f_scene_setting set x=#{x},y=#{y},update_date=NOW() WHERE sid = ( SELECT s.id FROM f_scene s WHERE s.scene_id = #{sceneId} AND s.uid = #{uid} AND mid = ( SELECT id FROM f_mesh WHERE mesh_id = #{meshId} ) )
